creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image, circumscribed by an oval, of a bridge with two figures at R talking; smaller figure crossing bridge on L side; hills, stone building in background
marks: in grahite on verso: Swanevelt BII:6 | APG 9222
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until November 10, 1987; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: A Stone Bridge
